long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension simulates the web app environments (User Agent and required APIs) of video streaming devices like set-top boxes, Tizen, PS WebMaf. It can be used for developers to use their desktop browsers to test web applications developed for those devices.  When you have selected a simulator for a loaded URL for the first time, it remembers your selection, and use the selection next time automatically.
